content: Begin Layer 5 (Integration) implementation - MCP server integration. Follow roadmap (BOOTSTRAP-COMPLETE.md Weeks 7-8). Implement MCP protocol with tool discovery endpoint, tool execution endpoint, and process memory query endpoint. Enable Serena integration, hot-reload testing, and external tool access. Target >90% test coverage. All quality gates must pass before completion.

integration_requirements: MCP protocol implementation for tool discovery
MCP protocol for tool execution (validate + render pipeline)
MCP protocol for process memory queries
External MCP client testing (e.g., Claude Code)
